title: Slovene font :: PLEASE HELP ME !!
content:
I am going crazy. What are these fonts??

Correct answers win enduring love.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/slovenefonts_5367.jpg)

 [‹ ID Font: Added Font: Eye of Judgment. identify 3 fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44290 "Go to previous forum topic") [Custom made? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45148 "Go to next forum topic")
author: benfreeman001

comments.content:
Could the top sample be News 701, or Clarion MT?

The second sample, “MED RAKI,” appears Bodoni-like but that bar on the E appears higher placed.

I think the third and fourth samples are also a Bodoni.

I believe the bottom one is Bodoni MT Condensed Bold.

No guarantees on the above!
Two, three, and four look like URW Bodoni. The sixth looks like Monotype Bodoni, Bold Condensed. The first is some sort of century-style modern, like Bitstream’s News705.
